ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:20:00 [Issue ID 4000-104638] urn:comicvine:4000-104638 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 17:25:01. [Issue ID 233549]
ComicInfo.Summary: With the team in disarray, the Artificial Man has gone off to kill Hitler and end the war. At the prodding of the government, it's up to the Proud American to stop him by any means necessary. The remaining heroes converge in the cold waters of the Atlantic Ocean, and the resulting chaos marks the end of the Golden Age. When all is said and done, we might not make it to the Silver Age.
